commit.message:
fix compilation on AUTO_INC_DEC targets

fix compilation on AUTO_INC_DEC targets
	* combine.c (combine_instructions) [AUTO_INC_DEC]: Declare links
	as an rtx.
	(try_combine) [AUTO_INC_DEC]: Declare a local link rtx.
